[REDACTED] have you considered using a repository for preservation and sharing of your data? [REDACTED] there is a disciplinary repository in your field that is usually the best place to share your data, if there is none you can use KU [REDACTED] RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) where you can apply embargo or restrict access if needed, this makes it easier for others to find your data and the repository will give you a DOI that you can mention in your publications.
